pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Welcome to our Digital Learning Hub 

You now have access to Microsoft 365 for Education, our one central place that empowers us to unlock creativity, promote teamwork and provide a simple safe experience.

Microsoft 365 includes Microsoft Teams, it gives us the platform for remote learning on either a mobile, tablet or browser.

Our Hub is hosting a range of resources to help us get started, including: 

  • Quick Guides and Demos on what and how to use 
  • Training Resources for School Leaders, Educators, Students and Parents
  • Scenario Library and Case Studies 
  • IT Security and Safeguarding Instructions 

We will be using Microsoft Teams as our remote learning platform for staff and students, it brings together our conversations, content, assignments and apps together in one place.​

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​When you open Microsoft Teams you will instantly be part of your classes and a whole staff team. ​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Training courses

Sign into the Microsoft Educator Center and find courses made by and for teachers to support digital learning. Earn points to become certified as a Microsoft Innovator Educator.

  • A range of development resources you can do from one minute, one hour or one day
  • Getting Started with Online Learning in Office
  • Accessibility, Special Education, and online learning: Supporting equity in a remote learning environment
  • Transform Learning in Teams
  • Crafting a Collaborative learning environment with Class Teams

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: A 5-step approach to help schools shift as effortlessly as possible to distance learning

Provide a positive learning environment remotely

Learn from schools that have already implemented Microsoft Teams and are using Office 365 apps, Flipgrid, and Minecraft: Education Edition to provide a positive learning environment remotely. They share their learnings of what has worked, and lessons learnt.

  • Webinar - Remote learning insights with Cornerstone Academy Trust
  • Webinar - Remote learning insight with Ribblesdale High School

Key resources

Key resources to support 'how to' and training.

  • Microsoft Teams Quick Start Guide
  • Microsoft Teams How To Video
  • Office 365 Help Pages
  • Frequently Used Links
  • PowerPoint Screen Recording Feature
